title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Human Tissue (Transplantation, PostMortem, Anatomical Examination and Public Display) Act 2024
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Human Tissue (Transplantation, PostMortem, Anatomical Examination and Public Display) Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Human Tissue (Transplantation, PostMortem, Anatomical Examination and Public Display) Act 2024 
(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited human tissue (transplantation postmortem anatomical examination public display) act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Human Tissue (Transplantation, PostMortem, Anatomical Examination and Public Display) Act 2024
heading: 2. The 17th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Human Tissue (Transplantation, Post-Mortem, Anatomical 
Examination and Public Display) Act 2024 (No. 5 of 2024) shall come into 
operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

sections 1 to 36; 

section 37(1) except paragraph (k) in so far as that paragraph 
relates to the deletion of Regulation 21 of the European Union 
for 
intended 
(Quality and Safety of Human Organs 
Transplantation) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 325 of 2012); 

(c) 

section 105; 

(d) 

section 107; 

(e) 

(f) 

section 108; 

section 110. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 June, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [250] 3
